lines.text: We all woke up from these creepy containers just a moment ago.
We’re feeling tired, but we appear to be fine otherwise.
Wait a minute, you beat the 5 Trials didn’t you?
And you took out that weird machine thing too? Nice!
Huh you know, besides all the soot you look pretty fine.
Did you actually beat the 5 Trials without getting hit? That’s awesome!
And on your first try too!
Ha! I’m only kidding… I think.
Everyone’s probably worried sick over us.
I reckon I owe him a few beers.
